repo.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability
repo.name: neovim

body:
Follow-up to #26429.

Problem: Many places in the code use `findoption()` to access an option using its name, even if the option index is available. This is very slow because it requires looping through the options array over and over.

Solution: Use option index instead of name wherever possible. Also introduce an `OptIndex` enum which contains the index for every option as enum constants, this eliminates the need to pass static option names as strings.

comment_data.body:
we have `kOptVal*` and `kOptReq*`, and conflicts aren't possible because of the CamelCasing. shorter is better (as long as it's readable) :)

```suggestion
  w(('  kOpt%s = %u,'):format(title_case(o.full_name), i - 1))
```
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -229,4 +236,15 @@ w('')
 for _, v in ipairs(defines) do
   w('#define ' .. v[1] .. ' ' .. v[2])
 end
+
+-- Generate options enum file
+opt_fd = assert(io.open(options_enum_file, 'w'))
+
+w('typedef enum {')
+w('  kOptionInvalid = -1,')
+for i, o in ipairs(options.options) do
+  w(('  kOption%s = %u,'):format(title_case(o.full_name), i - 1))

@@ -229,4 +236,15 @@ w('')
 for _, v in ipairs(defines) do
   w('#define ' .. v[1] .. ' ' .. v[2])
 end
+
+-- Generate options enum file
+opt_fd = assert(io.open(options_enum_file, 'w'))
+
+w('typedef enum {')
+w('  kOptionInvalid = -1,')
+for i, o in ipairs(options.options) do
+  w(('  kOption%s = %u,'):format(title_case(o.full_name), i - 1))

comment_data.body: It seems that an assertion is also needed here.
I think this change should be reverted, because `OptIndex` doesn't include the index of the final `NULL` option.
@zeertzjq Instead of reverting it, I instead added a `kOptIndexCount` and removed the `NULL` option. That way we can use `kOptIndexCount` to iterate through the `options[]` array instead.

Isn't all options lowercase anyway so only the `:upper()` part is needed here? Also, if we ever were to add cased option names (which we will not, but if we would), it would be fine to hypothetically preserve that.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -41,6 +42,12 @@ local list_flags = {
   flagscomma = 'P_COMMA|P_FLAGLIST',
 }
 
+--- @param s string
+--- @return string
+local title_case = function(s)
+  return s:sub(1, 1):upper() .. s:sub(2):lower()

repo.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

labels.description: changes that are not features or bugfixes
labels.name: refactor

title: refactor(options): reduce `findoption()` usage
